::Killfest/DarkMouse::

Killfest looks at Apocalypse and nods. "I agree. I don't think 
Megatron would be too peaceful with us. He's already tried to take 
over once. He needs to be eliminated."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
"Sure thing. On my way," Darkmouse replies. She exits the bridge and 
heads for the engine room.

"What's up?" she asks as she enters.





--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Apocalypse grinned. There could be only noe pred empire. And that 
empire 
> would be controled by drillbit. He walked into the engine room. He 
looked at 
> Killfest. "The time is now. We must destroy megatron while we have 
the 
> chance. I expect destron support against him. There will be only 
one empire. 
> That is this one." He sent a comm to Darkmouse. "Please come to the 
engine 
> room."
